header.title: Observer

erlref.modulesummary: A GUI tool for observing an erlang system.

description.p: The observer is gui frontend containing various tools to inspect a system. It displays system information, application structures, process information, ets or mnesia tables and a frontend for tracing with ttb.
See the user's guide for more information about how to get started.

desc.p: This function starts the observer gui. Close the window to stop the application.
